panels.description: Number of attempts made to check peer reachability
panels.title: Peer attempt count

panels.description: Number of unreachable peers reported by Hive
panels.title: Unreachable Peers count

panels.description: Number of errors extracting peer underlay.
panels.title: Peer underlay error count

panels.description: Number of peers that are reachable
panels.title: Reachable peers count

panels.description: Shows success rate of connection attempts from Hive
panels.title: Connectivity success rate

panels.description: Number of peers that could not be stored
panels.title: Store peer error count

panels.description: The total number of synced peers. Duplicate increments are expected for the same peer.
panels.title: Synced Peers

panels.description: The total number of peers marked as unsynced.
panels.title: Unsynced Peers

panels.description: The total number of invalid proofs we've received. duplicate increments are expected.
panels.title: Invalid Proof

panels.description: The total number of errors we've received when asking for a proof from a peer. Duplicates increments are expected.
panels.title: Peer Errors

panels.description: The total time spent waiting for proofs (not per-peer but rather per cycle).
panels.title: Total Waiting
